description: Documentation for 9.7.16.3.1.2. Absolute address mode for K dimension being 48B

files.title: Overview
files.summary: The `tcgen05.mma` instruction with *K-dimension* of 48B would overflow the 128B shared memory boundary if the data is packed contiguously.

files.title: tcgen05-leading-dimension-byte-offset-absolute-address-restriction
files.summary: Following are the restrictions on the absolute address stride mode:
